metadata.title: CVE-2024-33655 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Unbound could be used to take part in a DoS attack

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-33655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunbound8 - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.6
python-unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.6
python3-unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.6
unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.6
unbound-anchor - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.6
unbound-host - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unbound package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.4-2ubuntu1.6').
